prompts: Create a snake-like Pokemon with glowing eyes and a sleek silver body.
Imagine a dark-type Pokemon that blends into urban environments with a stealthy appearance.
Show me a serpentine creature with an intimidating presence and shiny metallic scales.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in caves, featuring a unique design and sinister color palette.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies both elegance and danger, with accents of yellow on its body.
Design a Pokemon that can camouflage effectively in forest settings, with subtle shades of gray.
Make a creature that has a menacing look with sharp eyes and a fluid, snake-like form.
